HamCalc 2.1 documentation

The HamCalc Port ProjectÂ¶

This is a project to convert HamCalc from GW-Basic to other, more universally useful languages.

See http://www.cq-amateur-radio.com/cq_ham_calc/cq_ham_calc.html

One initial focus is to convert HamCalc to Python. Other languages can certainly be supported.

As the project grows and expands, perhaps some elements of the legacy HamCalc will be discareded and new features added.
